name: MIYUKI
description:
Heya there my hushpuppies! It's Eaccoonger and today I have a short message from our beloved Sone Miyuki!

Sone Miyuki is a character from the game You and Me and Her and I think it deserves a lot more recognition!

Here is a short video of Miyuki's Message too:

Love you all! Stay safe ma dudes ✌
